PageWidgetPortable.Title: Notas Fiscais Eletr√¥nica
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_CLI_DOCUMENTOSNFE.GRID</EntityViewName> <DefaultFilterName>Todos</DefaultFilterName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.DOCUMENTO IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS B WHERE B.PESSOA IN (SELECT C.PESSOA FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS C WHERE C.HANDLE = @USUARIO) AND B.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalCliente/e/NFe/DetalhesNFe.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
